alert.note: Alert for City of Bristol; Russell; Scott; Washington (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 5:19PM EDT until July 28 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Russell County in southwestern Virginia... The City of Bristol in southwestern Virginia... Southeastern Scott County in southwestern Virginia... Southwestern Washington County in southwestern Virginia... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 518 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles southwest of Cleveland Va, or 14 miles northwest of Bristol Va, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bristol Va, Abingdon, Nickelsville, Collingwood, Castlewood, Hilander Park and Benhams. This includes Interstate 81 in Virginia between mile markers 2 and 16. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Bristol; Russell; Scott; Washington
